channel.title: Your PvP Drops - Updated
channel.description:
Title says it all really...
I just killed someone but didn't get the fucking drop :| BS imo, because it was a full fight.
I'll post another one if I get one that's mine -.-
[URL=http://img205.imageshack.us/i/kill1o.jpg/][IMG]http://img205.imageshack.us/img205/2503/kill1o.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img413.imageshack.us/i/ww760.jpg/][IMG]http://img413.imageshack.us/img413/9863/ww760.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img832.imageshack.us/i/badasswhipr.jpg/][IMG]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/9592/badasswhipr.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img832.imageshack.us/i/waffledup.jpg/][IMG]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/8008/waffledup.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.title: Your PvP Drops - Updated
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“youridudock, post:13, topic:351053”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=447409.msg3289533#msg3289533 date=1280443672]

Well any notable drops i’ve gotten
4 Ancient stat drops
2 VLS drops
1Vesta chain
2Vesta chainskirts
3vesta chainskirt corrupts

LIAR

Not all at once ofcourse xDDD

Rofl, your such a liar.
[/quote][/quote]

Although he doesn’t have proof, it is very possible. If you are risking a nice amount vs. a target and have death potential (even if you don’t have some of these things) the drops are very possible. A friend of mine PKs a lot and has gotten 2 VLS, a few or more ancient statuettes, and some other Vesta pieces.

Anyway, I started AGS PKing last week and I have made some nice profit. I will be remembering this thread with any more PK drops I get.

Read full topic

item.title: Your PvP Drops - Updated
item.dc:creator: @_The_One `The One
item.description:
@_The_One wrote:

He’s not lying… That’s not much for 7 months. In 1 week I got 16M total on my level 58 pure. I don’t take screenies though, next kill I get I’ll screen it ;).

Read full topic

jmood128:

I got a rune 2h once.

The most things I got while in Pvp is rune platebody, 2h, scimy, battle, and 2k bronze arrows…

Was worth like 100k…

And you get better drops when your Ep is high… I wonder how you high it
